summary: The Sustainable Vessel Fuel Act amends the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to provide a special tax credit for sustainable vessel fuel. It defines "sustainable vessel fuel" and sets requirements for its production and use, including emission standards and adherence to industry standards. The bill extends the availability of the clean fuel production credit for sustainable vessel fuel to December 31, 2035, and the changes apply to fuel produced after December 31, 2025.
